name: DOC_REL_MEMBERS
description: This table contains patient (EPT) IDs associated with a document (DCS). For example, if a document is scanned for a referral, the patient on the referral will be stored in this table.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for this document.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the member associated with this document. Multiple members can be associated with a single document.

columns.name: DOC_REL_MEM_ID
columns.description: The patient (EPT) ID related to the scan. For example, if a document (DCS) is attached to a referral, this is the patient associated with the referral.
